law.catch_line: Surety contracts subject to general provisions.
law.text: All contracts of surety insurance covering subjects of insurance resident, located, or to be performed in this state are subject to the applicable provisions of this subtitle, Subtitle 14, and other applicable provisions of this code.
law.history: Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 301, subtit. 21, sec. 1, effective June 18, 1970.
